trans-unit.source: Represents progress data reported in an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업에서 보고 된 진행률 데이터를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties that describe progress for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에 대 한 진행률을 설명 하는 속성이 포함 된 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, 및 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>이벤트.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: Not every property in this class applies to each event.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 모든 속성의 각 이벤트에 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> represent the total number of bytes downloaded to date and the total number of bytes in the download operation, respectively; they apply to all three events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>및 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A>각각 총 바이트 수를 나타내는 날짜 및 다운로드 작업의 바이트의 총 수에 다운로드 되 고 모든 세 개의 이벤트에 적용 합니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> names the file group corresponding to the current <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> event, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> reflects the current stage of the download operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>현재 해당 되는 파일 그룹 이름을 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>이벤트 및 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>다운로드 작업의 현재 단계를 반영 합니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes already downloaded by this operation.
trans-unit.target: 이 작업에 이미 다운로드 된 바이트 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesCompleted property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, BytesCompleted 속성은 배포 매니페스트를 다운로드를 참조 합니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, 매니페스트, 어셈블리 및 데이터 파일의 전체 업데이트를 포함된 다운로드 진행률을 해당 속성이 참조 합니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, 속성은 명명된 된 그룹의 일부인 파일의 전체 집합의 다운로드 진행률을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the data already transferred, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int64>바이트에서 복사한 데이터를 이미 나타내는.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in the download operation.
trans-unit.target: 다운로드 작업의 총 바이트 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesTotal property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, BytesTotal 속성은 배포 매니페스트를 다운로드를 참조 합니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, 매니페스트, 어셈블리 및 데이터 파일의 전체 업데이트를 포함된 다운로드 진행률을 해당 속성이 참조 합니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, 속성은 명명된 된 그룹의 일부인 파일의 전체 집합의 다운로드 진행률을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the total size of the download, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int64>바이트 단위로 다운로드의 전체 크기를 나타내는.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 다운로드할 파일 그룹의 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: You can initiate multiple calls to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> and download multiple file groups simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 여러 호출을 시작할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>여러 파일 그룹을 동시에 다운로드 합니다.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use Group to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group.
trans-unit.target: 어떤 그룹에 해당 하는 이벤트 콜백을 확인을 사용 하 여 그룹입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the file group, if the event occurred as the result of a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>; otherwise, a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>이벤트에 대 한 호출의 결과로 발생 한 경우 파일 그룹의 이름이 포함 된 <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>, 그렇지 않으면 빈 문자열.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: 프로세스는 현재 실행 중인 작업을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"></xref> value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"> </xref> 작업이 현재 다운로드 요소를 나타내는 값입니다.
